item.title: NCLH
item.description: score:45 Chances: NCLH has shown rising price performance and earned an upgrade to its IBD Relative Strength Rating. Goldman Sachs initiated coverage of cruise stocks with a positive outlook, citing sustainable pricing improvements driven by industry practices and incremental pricing tailwinds. Risks: NCLH’s stock price has seen some fluctuations in the latest trading sessions, with both gains and losses.
